DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine CP-945,598 effective treatment obesity type 2 diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: A 1-Year Study On The Effects Of CP-945,598 For The Treatment Of Obesity In Overweight Type 2 Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The CP-945,598 program terminate November 3 , 2008 due change regulatory perspective risk/benefit profile CB1 class likely new regulatory requirement approval . No safety issue involve termination decision .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must overweight ( BMI 27 50 kg/m2 ) Subjects must type 2 diabetes mellitus Pregnancy Serious unstable current past medical condition
